name: My Car Wash Salon
description:
For all who love cars, meet the cutest and funniest car! He's all dirty now but here at this special car salon he'll have the time of his life! Wash him with a special car shampoo, wash the wheels and make this amazing car sparkle!

Now you're almost ready to hit the road but first... !

Features:
- Car wash steps: shampooing, cleansing, cleaning the dirty wheels, drying, polishing
- Tuning steps: amazing colors and patterns, stickers, lights and mirrors
- It's a FUN and SAFE game for kids of all ages!

How to play:
- Chose your car game type from different options.
- Wash and clean it with shampoo, sponge and other basic washing spa steps it car salon.
- Give it a final wash.
- Color your cars from all of your favorite color options available like Red, Green, Blue, Purple, Pink and Yellow etc.
- Paste different vibrant stickers on your monster cars to add on to its beauty.
- Change your super cars wheels and you are all set to go.

Thank you for downloading our Car Wash Salon!
